metadata.title: CVE-2018-8098 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the index.c:read_entry() function while decompressing a compressed prefix length in libgit2 before v0.26.2 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted repository index file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-8098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-1.1 - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
libgit2-fixtures - 0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1
No subscription required

notes.note: msalvatore> Downgrading to low: "As the index is never transferred via the network, exploitation requires an attacker to have access to the local repository."

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
